title: Sam Altman Resumes Role at OpenAI Board â€“ Turning the Page on Ouster Controversy
description: In a significant turn of events for OpenAI, CEO Sam Altman has been absolved of any wrongdoing and has returned to his position on the board. After a comprehensive investigation by the law firm WilmerHale, it was concluded that Altman’s ouster was primarily due to strained relations and a loss of trust with the previous […]
